name: 楊神珠
objective:
This course aims to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. It will focus on learning the fundamentals of financial management and applying for main decisions making while facing every day by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

Course Goals and Learning Objectives:
1. Gaining financial experience/framework for students.
2. Understanding basic principles of financial management.
3. Applying knowledge to the Management Business Simulation. 
4. Roleplay as a CEO/CFO, students will apply various tools for financial management decisions.

By using an integrated Management Business simulation game as a major learning tool to illustrate how strategic and operational/financial decisions should be made in a competitive dynamic environment. So they will experience integrating and aligning key decision factors in different business scenarios. Simultaneously to achieve a set of defined performance objectives of a company by evaluating decision alternatives and tradeoffs for optimizing the resource utilization.
